name: Social Services and Family Caregiver Support
description: Case Management (Social Services): Kimochi offers a variety of social services for seniors. The goal of Kimochi’s Social Service programs is to provide support and activities that will enable individuals to maintain independent living. For In-person meeting, Phone or Video conferencing appointments are recommended. Some of our services include: - Information and referral - Advocacy for the elderly - Translation services - Hospital and home visitation - Escort to medical appointments - Emotional

howToGetIt: Social Service elgibility: 1. Resident of the City and County of San Francisco 2. Individual must be 60 years of age or older 3. Family member, caregiver or concerned friend can apply on senior’s behalf 4. Successfully complete the program intake, assessment, and application process
